name: The Kings Hand HTML
description:
Control formations of units that built to be a army fit with giants,samurai,archers and more defend against the viking hoard. This game has elements akin to total war and LOTR battle for middle earth. This was a project for my AI class.

BE WARMED THIS IS A LAGGY VERSION IT IS BEST TO PLAY THE .EXE VERSION FOUND HERE: https://frozenwipstudios.itch.io/the-kings-hand
